PresenceObjectAllocator Class Reference

Helper class that makes the memory allocation for PresenceObjects more effective. More...

#include <PresenceObjectAllocator.h>

 ~PresenceObjectAllocator ()
 Destructor.

PresenceObject * create (int c, Unit &u, double f)
 Provides a PresenceObject with the specified properties either by using an already allocated PresenceObject or by allocating a new one.

void dismiss (PresenceObject *p)
 Notifies the PresenceObjectAllocator that the provided PresenceObject will no longer be used and that it thus may be considered freed.

void reset ()
 Resets the PresenceObjectAllocator by deallocating all memory used.

 Allocated and used PresenceObjects.

Detailed Description

Helper class that makes the memory allocation for PresenceObjects more effective.

Provides a PresenceObject with the specified properties either by using an already allocated PresenceObject or by allocating a new one.

f The fraction of the Unit.

A PresenceObject with the specified properties.

Notifies the PresenceObjectAllocator that the provided PresenceObject will no longer be used and that it thus may be considered freed.
